programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Comic horror from Wes Craven, starring Eddie Murphy and Angela Bassett. nSleek Caribbean vampire Maximillian, who can transform himself in a thousand different ways, arrives in New York in search of Rita Veder, an NYPD detective who is unaware that she is half-human, half-vampire, and who is to be his bride.n Wes Craven - Director Eddie Murphy - Maximillian / Preacher Pauley / Guido Angela Bassett - Rita Allen Payne - Justice Kadeem Hardison - Julius John Witherspoon - Silas Zakes Mokae - Dr Zeko Joanna Cassidy - Dewey Simbi Khali - Nikki Eddie Murphy - Maximillian / Preacher Pauley / Guido Angela Bassett - Rita Allen Payne - Justice Kadeem Hardison - Julius John Witherspoon - Silas Zakes Mokae - Dr Zeko Joanna Cassidy - Dewey Simbi Khali - Nikki.

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Sci Fi, Fantasy, Horror, Drama ║ 1992 ║ PG

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Romantic fantasy drama starring Brad Pitt and Anthony Hopkins. Media tycoon William Parrish has lived a rich life in every sense, but fears that his days are numbered. Tony discovers that by moving up and down this fateful train, he can transport himself forward and backward to various stages of his life. Not only that, but the actions he takes in one carriage directly affect his life in the next. In the middle of all this, the Brady bunch - mum, dad and six children - live a happy and idyllic existence, caught in a time warp of 1970s values. programme.title: Thanksgiving

programme.desc: 'PIPPA' follows Captain Balram Singh Mehta of India's 45 Cavalry as he and his siblings battle on the eastern front during the 1971 Indo-Pakistani war, showcasing his journey to maturity.

programme.title: Ghoomer
programme.desc: Anina, a talented cricketer, loses her hand but teams up with a former pro to create a wild new bowling style called 'Ghoomer' for her comeback!

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Check out a fun roundup of the hottest Bollywood tracks that everyone is buzzing about! Discover the tunes that are making waves in the music scene.

programme.title: Dream Girl
programme.desc: Karamveer gets a job at a call centre due to his ability to talk in a woman's voice. He garners a big fan following but soon gets in trouble with his overzealous clients.

programme.title: Turtle
programme.desc: In a drought-hit Rajasthan village, Sanjay Mishra plays Ramkaran, who digs for water while locals engage in a tug of war on his shell, desperate for relief.

programme.title: Mera Naam Joker
programme.desc: Join a clown on his emotional journey from a tough childhood to breathtaking circus performances, discovering joy, resilience, and the power of laughter along the way. It's a heartfelt ride!

programme.title: Jigar
programme.desc: Raju and Duryodhan are tight pals until a tragic misunderstanding shatters their friendship. Fueled by anger, Raju trains hard for revenge, leading to a shocking showdown in the ring.

programme.title: Desh Premee
programme.desc: Master Dinanath, a freedom fighter, leaves his village with his son Raju. He takes shelter with four crooks and tries to unite them, unaware that they are taking advantage of him.

programme.title: Gadar 2
programme.desc: (Movies @6) Jeete dives into a tricky labyrinth in search of his missing dad, who's gone missing in Pakistan. It's an epic adventure filled with twists and turns!

programme.title: Mission Raniganj
programme.desc: Join mining engineer Jaswant Singh Gill as he tackles an intense rescue mission to save 65 miners stuck in a submerged coal mine. Will he succeed against the odds?

programme.title: Ghayal Once Again
programme.desc: After a shocking video reveals his mentor's murder, an investigative journalist dives headfirst into a dangerous quest for justice, determined to uncover the truth behind the brutal crime.

programme.title: Gopi
programme.desc: A relatable story about an everyday hero battling against a frustrating system. With fantastic acting and sharp dialogues, it highlights the struggles of ordinary life in society.

programme.title: Lootere
programme.desc: Anajali is taken far away from the city by police officer Karan. Her life is in danger as an eye witness in a murder case.

programme.title: Pyar Mohabbat
programme.desc: After 18 years away, Prince Naresh, now Dilip, returns home only to find chaos. With a fake identity, he navigates love, deception, and an impending throne conflict. Will he survive?

programme.title: Vidhata
programme.desc: Kunal is on a mission for revenge, but along the way, he stumbles upon family secrets and unravels intriguing mysteries that change everything. Buckle up for the ride!

programme.title: Ravanasura
programme.desc: Ravindra, a junior lawyer with a goofy reputation, struggles to gain respect. However, hidden beneath his quirky exterior lies untapped potential and surprising depth waiting to be discovered.

programme.title: Aitraaz
programme.desc: (Movies @6) In a twist of fate, a man finds himself suing for sexual harassment after his boss's wife wrongly accuses him of rape. Who will the jury side with?

programme.title: The Last Color
programme.desc: In 'The Last Color,' a heartwarming tale unfolds as a young tight-rope walker and a widow named Noor in Vrindavan challenge tradition to joyfully celebrate Holi and embrace colors together.

programme.title: Jeete Hai Shaan Se
programme.desc: In Bombay, three best friends must choose between loyalty to each other and their new families, all while a cunning gangster lurks, ready to exploit their dilemma.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Check out a fun roundup of the hottest Bollywood tracks that everyone is buzzing about! Discover the tunes that are making waves in the music scene.

programme.title: Baat Ban Jaaye
programme.desc: Nisha, a wealthy woman in charge of her family business, does not want to marry a rich man. She falls in love with Suraj Singh, a wedding singer and dancer, without realising that he has other plans.

programme.title: Henna
programme.desc: Engagement day accident leads to Kashmir and love, spy suspicion.

programme.title: Love In Tokyo
programme.desc: Ashok's mother, Gayatridevi, wants him to marry Sarita though he loves Asha. However, after Ashok loses his eyesight in an accident, things get difficult for him.

programme.title: Saudagar
programme.desc: When two former pals find their rivalry reignited by their grandchildren's unexpected romance, old grudges resurface, sparking hilarity and chaos as they navigate family ties and friendship.

programme.title: Satyameva Jayate
programme.desc: (Movies @6) A man has been tasked to catch the person behind police killings in the city. Both are eventually against the same enemy, but divided by the law.

programme.title: Attack
programme.desc: Arjun, left paralyzed after a brutal attack, is on a mission for revenge. Fueled by his desire to serve his nation, he fights back against those who hurt him.

programme.title: Happy Phirr Bhag Jayegi
programme.desc: A woman who travels to China to find her fiance, gets mistakenly kidnapped by some goons who were to abduct another woman of the same name travelling by the same flight.

programme.title: Coolie No. 1
programme.desc: After being insulted by a rich businessman named Rosario, pandit Jai Kishen teaches him a lesson by getting his daughter married to Raju - a Coolie posing as a millionaire.

programme.title: Grand Masti
programme.desc: Meet, Prem, and Amar look to have a blast at their college reunion, though they soon find themselves in another predicament.

programme.title: Chhoriyan Chhoron Se Kam Nahi Hoti

programme.title: Leader
programme.desc: In a world of political corruption, a well-educated idealist and son of a leader strives to reform the system. Can he outsmart the game of power and create real change?

programme.title: Mere Jeevan Saathi

programme.desc: Biographical music drama starring Tijan Njie and Elan Ben Ali.
